title:Oddities I'm looking for
description:Weapons that aren't in a roll list that look interesting to me

// Double-Edged Answer - PvE Minors ()
//notes: Flash Counter plus Destabilizing Rounds - use the FC block to reflect damage back and proc Volatility.
